data.comment: It's a decent banking app. Mostly easy to use and generally reliable. Does tend to pop up more 'offers' than strictly necessary.
statement should be available to print from app.massaging service is poor.really need a email client to talk.because it is more useful and reliable for any type of enquiry.
It's essential for me to tracking balance every day and transfer money. I'm more and reliant Internet banking it's instantaneous trusted most of all very excellent banking site.
